questions.question: What is your company name?
questions.description: Company name that will appear on the cover slide

questions.question: What is the name of your product or service?
questions.description: Main product name used throughout the deck

questions.question: What is your one-line value proposition or tagline?
questions.description: Concise statement of value that appears on the cover

questions.question: What date will this presentation be delivered?
questions.description: Date to display on the cover slide

questions.question: What sales contact information should be included?
questions.description: Contact details for prospects to reach out

questions.question: What category does your product fall into?
questions.description: Helps prospects understand what type of solution you offer

questions.question: What is the main business benefit customers achieve?
questions.description: High-level outcome that resonates with executives

questions.question: What are the top 3 key features of your product?
questions.description: Core capabilities that solve the customer's problem

questions.question: What benefits and outcomes should be highlighted in the value proposition table?
questions.description: Each benefit should have a corresponding measurable outcome

questions.question: How do you differentiate from competitors? Provide competitor approaches and your advantages.
questions.description: Side-by-side comparison showing why you're better

questions.question: What is the primary pain point your customers face?
questions.placeholder: Manual data entry takes 40% of employees' time

questions.question: What operational inefficiency or limitation do they experience?
questions.description: Secondary challenge that amplifies the pain
questions.placeholder: Legacy systems can't integrate with modern tools

questions.question: What business risk or cost impact results from this problem?
questions.placeholder: Delays cost $50K per month in lost revenue
